info.title: Provider and User Data APIs
info.description:
This API enables seamless access to comprehensive details about provider firms, their offices, associated users, and internal user.
Provider Firm Overview
  • High-level information about the provider firm.
  • Details about all offices linked to the provider firm.
  • Information on users and fee earners associated with the provider firm.
Provider Office Details

Key information about individual offices, including:

  • Bank account details.
  • Contract and schedule details.
  • NMS authorizations.
  • Users associated with each office.
Provider User Details

Granular information about individual users, including:

  • User roles.
  • Associations with provider offices.
Useful Links
  • Runbook
  • Slack Channel
  • Grafana Dashboards
  • Github Source Code

This service is under active development and is deployed frequently.
While we strive not to change endpoint contracts, we may deprecate existing endpoints and introduce new ones. Please check the Swagger page regularly for up-to-date information.

tags.name: Provider Users Endpoints
tags.description: These are UTILITY ENDPOINTS for getting provider user information when only have a user-login but you don't have a provider firm id. This allows you to find firm with which provider user is associated and using that you can find more details related to provider firm.

tags.name: Provider Firm Offices
tags.description: These are UTILITY ENDPOINTS for getting office information when only have office code but you don't have a provider firm id. This allows you to find firm with which office is associated and using that you can find more details related to provider firm.

tags.name: Admin Controller Endpoints
tags.description: These are UTILITY ENDPOINTS ONLY FOR ADMINS.

post.summary: Get all provider(firm) offices(sites) details based on a list of office(site) codes. Max limit 1000.
post.description:
Business Rules: - Firm is not end dated.
                    - Firm is of type Legal Services Provider / Advocate / Chambers.
                    - Firms of type Individual / QM Provider are NOT considered.
                    - Firm Office is not end dated.
                    - This DOES NOT check if a provider office has an active contract.

200.description: List of valid provider (firm) offices (sites) details

204.description: No Content - No valid provider (firm) offices (sites) exist based on search criteria

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong

post.summary: Change logging level dynamically to TRACE to aid in debugging.Make sure this is done on all pods.
Change logging level dynamically to INFO to disable debugging.Make sure this is done on all pods.
Force cache reload. Apply maintenance page before doing this otherwise it can cause side-effects / race conditions.

get.summary: Get a provider(firm) user details based on user login
get.description:
Business Rules: - Firm is not end dated.
                    - Firm is of type Legal Services Provider / Advocate / Chambers.
                    - Firms of type Individual / QM Provider are NOT considered.
                    - User attribute_code is 'ICX_SUPPLIER_ORG_ID'
                    - User attribute_code of these values ('ICX_HR_PERSON_ID', 'ICX_SUPPLIER_SITE_ID')
                        are not considered as firm contacts.

204.description: No Content - No active user exists based on search criteria

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong

get.summary: Get list of office codes associated with provider(firm) user based on user login
get.description:
Business Rules: - Firm is not end dated.
                    - Firm is of type Legal Services Provider / Advocate / Chambers.
                    - Firms of type Individual / QM Provider are NOT considered.
                    - Firm office is not end dated.
                    - User attribute_code is 'ICX_SUPPLIER_ORG_ID'
                    - User attribute_code of these values ('ICX_HR_PERSON_ID', 'ICX_SUPPLIER_SITE_ID')
                        are not considered as firm contacts.
                    - Firm Office is not end dated.
                    - For the Provider User Office links only create one per Office where the Provider User
                        has no restrictions (All option), or one for each Office that the User is restricted to.

204.description: No Content - No active office codes exist for the user

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong

Business Rules: - Firm is not end dated.
                    - Firm is of type Legal Services Provider / Advocate / Chambers.

204.description: No Content - No valid provider (firm) office (site) exists based on search criteria

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong

get.summary: Get all provider(firm) office(site) schedule details based on a provider(firm) office(site) code
get.description:
Business Rules: - Firm is not end dated.
                    - Firm is of type Legal Services Provider / Advocate / Chambers.
                    - Firms of type Individual / QM Provider are NOT considered.
                    - Firm Office is not end dated.
                    - Firm Office contract is active today or active on passed effective date.
                    - Firm office schedule is active today or active on passed effective date.
                    - Firm Office contract authorization status is APPROVED and contract status is Open.
                    - Firm office schedule authorization status is APPROVED and contract status is Open.
                    - Firm office schedule (for category of law) is not cancelled.

parameters.name: effectiveDate
parameters.description: Must be null for production , can specify a contract effective date for testing on lower environments

200.description: List of provider (firm) office contract and schedule details

204.description: No Content - No active contracts or schedules exist for the provider (firm) office

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong

get.summary: Get all active fee earners contacts for a providers(firms)
get.description:
Summary      :    Certain contacts in CWA can be classified as Fee Earners.
                      This is indicated by a flag set in ATTRIBUTE7 in the table HZ_PARTIES.
                      Fee Earners in CWA are nothing more than contacts which have been created with
                        Practitioner fields completed.
                      These fields indicate the type of Practitioner (Barrister/Solicitor), the
                        Practitioner Number and Practitioner Start/End dates.
                      Contacts created with Practitioner Type field as NULL are not Fee Earners.
    Business Rules: - Firm is not end dated.
                    - Firm is of type Legal Services Provider / Advocate / Chambers.
                    - Firms of type Individual / QM Provider are NOT returned.
                    - Fee Earner is not end dated.

200.description: List of fee earners for a firm

204.description: No Content - No active fee earner exists for the firm

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong
